Detailed Description

Engine that is used to manage the dataset.

This class provides a simple way to specify which dataset engine must be used in the classification stage of NessieOcr. It is intended to be used as a parameter of several methods of NessieOcr class, either NessieOcr::recognize() o NessieOcr::train(). Its members are used internally in that class to define a particular Dataset object associated with the engine, since such classes should not be accessible from a client program.
